PDF"}, {"question": "What are the reasons for failure to generate bank beneficiary code and remedy thereof? ", "answer": "The bank beneficiary code are not generated through PFMS mainly due to either of the
following shortcomings:-
1. Aadhaar is not in NPCI database
2. Aadhar status -Inactive
In that case the student needs to visit Aadhaar Enrollment center/Bank for updating any leftover information like personal details, contact details (mobile no) or any other information.
